summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4820 for the improvement of the alley in block 31, Gilman Park Addition, being the alley between West 59th Street and West 60th Street, from 15th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55638, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
